shortMSG:
You are in a courtyard. 
 There is a main gate that you can escape from this mansion.
 You may go check other areas through a garden gate at north west side, a garage door or a entrance at north side of the courtyard.
longMSG:
You are in a courtyard. 
 There is a main gate that you can escape from this mansion.
 You may go check other areas through a garden gate at north west side, a garage door or a entrance at north side of the courtyard.
